001package org.consensusj.bitcoinj.wallet;
002
003import org.bitcoinj.base.Address;
004import org.bitcoinj.base.Network;
005import org.bitcoinj.base.ScriptType;
006import org.bitcoinj.crypto.ECKey;
007import org.bitcoinj.crypto.ChildNumber;
008import org.bitcoinj.crypto.DeterministicKey;
009import org.bitcoinj.crypto.HDPath;
010import org.bitcoinj.wallet.DeterministicKeyChain;
011import org.bitcoinj.wallet.DeterministicSeed;
012import org.bitcoinj.wallet.KeyChainGroupStructure;
013
014import java.util.Objects;
015
016/**
017 * Deterministic Keychain for BIP44 and related BIPs
018 * <p>
019 * This class adds two things to {@link DeterministicKeyChain}:
020 * <ol>
021 *     <li>A constructor that builds the keychain using the correct paths for BIP44, etc.</li>
022 *     <li>Methods to get keys and addresses -- functionality that could/should also work with BIP 32</li>
023 * </ol>
024 */
025public class BipStandardDeterministicKeyChain extends DeterministicKeyChain {
026    private final ScriptType outputScriptType;
027    private final Network network;
028    private final HDPath pathReceiving;
029    private final HDPath pathChange;
030
031    /**
032     * Constructor for a BIP44-family compliant DeterministicKeyChain
033     * @param seed Seed to use
034     * @param network used to set coinType, etc
035     * @param outputScriptType script type for determining the purpose child
036     */
037    public BipStandardDeterministicKeyChain(DeterministicSeed seed, ScriptType outputScriptType, Network network) {
038        super(seed, null, outputScriptType, KeyChainGroupStructure.BIP43.accountPathFor(outputScriptType, network));
039        this.outputScriptType = outputScriptType;
040        this.network = network;
041        pathReceiving = super.getAccountPath().extend(DeterministicKeyChain.EXTERNAL_SUBPATH);
042        pathChange = super.getAccountPath().extend(DeterministicKeyChain.INTERNAL_SUBPATH);
043    }
044
045    /**
046     * Construct a BipStandardDeterministicKeyChain from a DeterministicKeyChain
047     * THIS IS NOT A WRAPPER, BUT A COPY -- THIS IS PROBABLY NOT WHAT WE WANT!
048     * @param hdChain existing DeterministicKeyChain
049     * @param network network (used for constructing addresses)
050     */
051    public BipStandardDeterministicKeyChain(DeterministicKeyChain hdChain, Network network) {
052        super(Objects.requireNonNull(hdChain.getSeed()),
053                null,
054                hdChain.getOutputScriptType(),
055                hdChain.getAccountPath());
056        this.outputScriptType = hdChain.getOutputScriptType();
057        this.network = network;
058        pathReceiving = super.getAccountPath().extend(DeterministicKeyChain.EXTERNAL_SUBPATH);
059        pathChange = super.getAccountPath().extend(DeterministicKeyChain.INTERNAL_SUBPATH);
060    }
061
062    public Address addressFromKey(ECKey key) {
063        return key.toAddress(outputScriptType, network);
064    }
065
066    public Address receivingAddr(int index) {
067        HDPath indexPath = pathReceiving.extend(new ChildNumber(index));
068        return address(indexPath);
069    }
070
071    public Address changeAddr(int index) {
072        HDPath indexPath = pathChange.extend(new ChildNumber(index));
073        return address(indexPath);
074    }
075
076    public Address address(HDPath path) {
077        DeterministicKey key = key(path);
078        return addressFromKey(key);
079    }
080
081    public DeterministicKey receivingKey(int index) {
082        return key(pathReceiving.extend(new ChildNumber(index)));
083    }
084
085    public DeterministicKey changeKey(int index) {
086        return key(pathChange.extend(new ChildNumber(index)));
087    }
088
089    public DeterministicKey key(HDPath path) {
090        return getKeyByPath(path,true);
091    }
092}
